Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/LessThan

Syntax Exp1 < Exp2
Types
Exp1 Exp2 Exp1 < Exp2
int int bool
int real bool
real real bool
Description Yields true if the value of Exp1 is numerically less than the value of Exp2, and false otherwise.
Examples 
rascal>13 < 12
bool: false
rascal>12 < 13
bool: true
rascal>13.5 < 12
bool: false
rascal>12.5 < 13
bool: true
Questions
Question 1.
The type of 1 < 1 is

Question 2.
The type of 10.65671881991712400 < 9.76256467459930800 is

Question 3.
The type of 2 < -2.086048294942006800 is

Question 4.
The type of -1 < 12.56082568747379600 is

Question 5. 
-16 < 12.65668629837148400 ==
